name: DevOp Services on GitHub
body:
### Welcome to DevOp Services on GitHub.
Here you'll find opensource projects and contributions by DevOp Services team memebers.

### Who are we?
We are passionate about using DevOps to help our customers succeed. Our mantra “Develop, Operate, Succeed.” is at the heart of who we are as a company. It reflects our passion and belief in superior execution of software development and IT operations services, and resonates our ultimate goal: “To help our customers succeed”

### What's in it for us?
We are big on giving back to the opensource community. Most of the tools we use are opensource and are built and supported by a great community of development, operations and devops contributers. We are glad to be a part of such a vibrant community and want to pay it forward.

### Authors and Contributors
In 2014, Rory Bramwell (@rbramwell) founded DevOp Services.

### Support or Contact
Contact support@devopservices.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
